name: FuneROLL
description:
FUNEROLL

In FuneROLL, you play as the infamous dice themed serial killer, 'Tombstone' as you stalk the unfortunate souls that enter your secret layer! 

You don't have the best balance, and often accidentally lose grip of your trusty cursed dice after landing a jump. Your cursed dice will summon as many victims as the number it lands on, but things can quickly get out of hand! Having too many victims alive, will raise your suspicion level (as displayed by the stars in the top right), and will eventually alert any nearby authorities! Try to collect as many kills as possible before you get caught!

for the GMTK Game Jam 2022!
